name: Jenne Kopalek
text: Hands down the best and most traditional new York style Italian food in the area. We've tried everywhere and now we refuse to go anywhere else.

name: An Da
text: The crust is fantastic. The sauce has the right amount of seasoning and the cheese perfect. The only difference between this and my favorite NYC pizza place is that I didn't have to dab all the grease of the top, maybe that's a good thing. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Britton
text: I‚Äôm from NY and Im pretty picky with pizza. This is some of the best pizza I‚Äôve tasted. And the garlic knots are amazing. Flavor was amazing texture was perfect , definitely will be my spot from now on.

name: TXMFeR
text: A place I've frequented for about 10 years.   The people have changed but quality hasn't. ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Smith
text: Great place to stop in for that last minute decision on a pizza and beer night. Wait staff always gives us good service and is attentive. Pizza while still good, seems to have changed over the last few months, going from just the right ‚Ä¶More

name: Jillian Holladay
text: Best thin crust pizza around. They have lunch specials that are a really good value. They have take out and delivery as well. You might pay less for a national chain pizza but you won't get the same quality.

name: Robbie Kerns
text: Haven't been in a while so I loved the changes.  The food was good and we got to help ARF.

name: Amy Vaughn
text: Pizza is awesome!!! Had the Greek pizza it was amazing. Staff was friendly the General Manager was out talking to customers.  Had a great family feel.  Will most definitely be going back.

name: Ismarie Serrano
text: The best calzone that I have ate. The service is excellent, really organized and they have a really big menu with different stuff, not just pizza. Excellent.

name: Virgie B
text: Overpriced small pizzas and the big salads are mainly lettuce - very little additional salad ingredients such as meat, tomatoes, mushrooms, and cucumbers. It was very disappointing.

name: Jim Albright
text: Great food and good prices.  We had the Johnny's Deluxe and it was amazing.  One of the best tasting pizzas around.  As far as watching sports while your there the tv screens aren't very big but the food makes up for it.

name: Stefanie Blowers
text: Always great service. I have tried many things on the menu and everything is always delicious. I recommend a sub sandwich and their spinach dip!

name: Bailea Brannin
text: I love coming to eat here. The food is great and the staff is super friendly. The service is great and it's always our first choice when we come to the shops.

name: Kristina Rowe
text: Friendly staff, great food. My chicken parmesan was great and the toasted garlic bread was light and airy with a nice crunch. After confirming that it's the same bread used on their subs, I decided that's what I'll try next time.

name: Garry Yates
text: I am a pizza snob.  I have had great pizza and horrible pizza.  Most of the pizza around the North Texas area ranges from okay to junk. Johnny Brusco's pizza is actually very good. Nice crust and toppings and the whole package just works. ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Schmitt
text: A couple of slices and a pitcher of beer....awesome!  You want a salad?  You can have that, too.  If you love pizza you'll lovery it here.

name: jon cross
text: great athmosphere pizza is always hot and tasty. kids love eating here. Staff is very friendly. Kids like the game room while Waiting on pizza

name: c smits
text: Great place for pizza and pitchers... The Bronx bomber was unexpected and delicious.

name: Richard MacDonald
text: Great pizza and not overloaded with cheese. Truly the closest to Italian pizza I have found in the entire DFW area.....

name: Kevin Lewis
text: It's the hole in the wall if there is such in FloMo. Great food, at good price and always easy to get in and out.

name: John Manley
text: Awesome NY style pizza with plenty of choices. Great appetizers, sandwiches, calzones / strombolis, and Italian dinners as well. Always awesome staff and plenty of tvs playing various sports or news. The large projector is great for the home games!

name: William Kannegieser
text: Pizza was soggy and sauce was watery . Slices are hanging in front of clients all day. Place is dirty .

name: Olivia Poprik
text: Pizza was good, but the name on the outside said Vaughn's Pizza... not Johnny Brusco.

name: Dustin Powell
text: Very good restaurant. Always polite service. Great food.

name: Angie Machado
text: The first time we had the pizza it was really good, last time I could barely find the tomato sauce.  To much cheese!

name: Chris MB
text: best pizza in the entire area just ensure that you get it hot and fresh, pizza is excellent to eat the next day upon reheating.

name: Makayla Bangon
text: It‚Äôs gud liek ur mum ;)

name: J Sal
text: Good food, the staff and interior reminds me of places I've eaten in New York.

name: Marie Etienne
text: Good pizza boring atmosphere

name: Caleb Jacobs
text: Generous portions, delicious food that isn't so heavy you regret everything, and very friendly staff.  We will be back!

name: Sue Lujan
text: Always good food and service.

name: Joseph Wilkinson
text: Good pizza and pasta dishes. Half restaurant half sports bar on the inside.

name: Jay Cannon
text: We really love the pizza here. Only small complaint I would have is that it can be slightly greasy at times

name: Lil Bunnyattic
text: Nice place that's full of nice people

name: Mary Loving Jones
text: Nice fresh food. Great experience.

name: Geoff Lawrence
text: Great pizza! Great Alfredo!

name: Mike Sperry
text: Live the place and the service could not be better.

name: Edward Mehlhaff
text: Great pizza!

name: Kiara York
text: Food was alright, service sucked.

name: Silvia Lara
text: Ordered a Pizza to go ,waited 30 minutes , called and the order was never placed . ‚òπÔ∏èÔ∏è So disappointed üò°

name: Omar Hamza
text: Good New York style pizza and calzones.

name: Bobby Strother
text: tasty pizza and a handful of good craft beers on tap

name: Steve Ermish
text: Great new york style pizza!

name: Brian Calef
text: Good pizza!

name: Albert Wiersch
text: Great pizza.

name: Jim Caputo
text: Awesome

name: Nathan Sassaman
text: Awesome Pizza, I love the Garlic Knots

name: Andy Dettmer
text: They wouldn't allow us to order our pizza ahead of time and eat it at the restaurant

name: Brian Mahan
text: A real let down
